title: Sustainable Wastewater Treatment Practitioner Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in environmental or civil engineering, experience operating wastewater treatment systems
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education for achieving SDG 6 (Clean Water Management) and SDG 4 (Lifelong Learning), offering a blended learning environment combining VR-based simulations and forum discussions.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze key stages of wastewater treatment processes and identify design errors with over 80% accuracy through VR simulations
Learners can present at least three sustainable wastewater treatment strategies linked to SDG 6 and explain practical implementation methods
Learners can derive on-site problem-solving solutions based on knowledge sharing with peer practitioners through forum-based collaborative learning
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
